columns.name: document_name
columns.description: The name of the Systems Manager document.

columns.name: shared_account_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID where the current document is shared.

columns.name: shared_document_version
columns.description: The version of the current document shared with the account.

columns.name: account_ids
columns.description: The account IDs that have permission to use this document. The ID can be either an AWS account or All.
